name: PaiNaiDee Backend
description: Thai Tourism API Backend - A comprehensive backend API for Thai tourism recommendations and attractions

SECRET_KEY.description: Secret key for Flask sessions and JWT tokens

DATABASE_URL.description: PostgreSQL database URL (automatically provided by Railway/Heroku)

DB_HOST.description: Database host (leave empty if using DATABASE_URL)

DB_NAME.description: Database name (leave empty if using DATABASE_URL)

DB_USER.description: Database username (leave empty if using DATABASE_URL)

DB_PASSWORD.description: Database password (leave empty if using DATABASE_URL)

DB_PORT.description: Database port (leave empty if using DATABASE_URL)
